data.title: Flights Kaliningrad - Yekaterinburg: Prices, schedule of direct flights
meta_keywords: flights Kaliningrad - Yekaterinburg buy flights from Kaliningrad buy flights to Yekaterinburg how much is a ticket Kaliningrad - Yekaterinburg
data.meta_description: Buy a ticket Kaliningrad - Yekaterinburg at a low price on our website is possible in just a few minutes. View schedule of upcoming flights Kaliningrad - Yekaterinburg as well as our special offers. Choose airline tickets online
data.text:
The fastest and most comfortable way to get from Kaliningrad to Yekaterinburg is by flight. Ural Airlines strives to make your trip not only convenient, but also economical. With our Promo tariff you can buy a ticket for the Kaliningrad-Yekaterinburg plane at the best price!

What does the basic tariff "Promo" include?

We have created this fare for passengers who want to travel as economically as possible. In the cost of the price for the flight Kaliningrad-Yekaterinburg, we have included the very necessary minimum that will allow you to travel light and comfortably: a seat on board the aircraft, hand luggage up to 5 kg and one suitcase weighing up to 10 kg. If you need to transport some more baggage, you can do it by paying for it as a separate service. A full list of our additional services can be found on our website or already at the stage of booking a ticket.

You can pay for your ticket with a bank card, in the Apple Pay app, or by paying by installments through Money Wall. If you are a member of the "Wings" bonus program, you can also pay for your ticket with accumulated bonuses.

As always, for the purchased ticket you will receive a cashback of 5% or more per card. Tickets for this fare are not refundable.

Economy, economy premium and business tariffs are also available for this direction.

High-quality service for each tariff

We try to ensure that your flights are always comfortable, so we have created an effective service system. Ural Airlines takes care of its customers already at the stage of booking a ticket. We have created a convenient and most understandable interface of our website so that you can conveniently book flights, as well as view the schedule and prices of tickets for the Kaliningrad-Yekaterinburg plane.

Our staff always cares about your comfort. Flight attendants supervise the flight and are always ready to answer any question that interests you.

For all passenger transportation we use only the most modern Airbus aircraft. Our airliners regularly undergo comprehensive diagnostics at specialized diagnostic centers of our company.

How to book tickets for a direct flight Kaliningrad-Yekaterinburg

It will take you just a few minutes to buy a ticket for a Ural Airlines plane. We have created a very user-friendly interface of the website and our proprietary application, so online booking will not cause you any difficulties.

You only need to go through a few steps:

In the corresponding field, enter the direction of the flight and the date, click "Search".

In a second, the available flights will be displayed on your screen. Choose the option you need.

Choose the one you want from the four offered rates.

If you have a promo code or certificate, enter their numbers in the appropriate field.

Fill in the information on the number of passengers and contact details.

After that, a list of additional services that you can purchase will appear on your screen. If necessary, select the required services.

Before you pay for your ticket, carefully check all the information provided.

In order to pay for the ticket, enter all the requested details. Payment can be made with a bank card, Apple Pay application, or with bonuses from the Wings program.

After payment has been made, an email will be sent to your email address with the reservation and detailed information on your flight.

What interesting places can you visit in Yekaterinburg:

The oldest city square in 1905. Here you can walk and take pictures with the administration building in the background. The luxurious architecture in the style of classicism will appeal to even the most sophisticated traveler.

The dam is a picturesque embankment, which has become a favorite place for walking and meeting of townspeople. Tourists loved this place for the opportunity to take very beautiful photos.

Opera theatre. To visit an opera or watch a ballet is a great program for relaxing in Yekaterinburg. If you are not a fan of art, you can just walk to this building. After all, its snow-white facade with columns and statues looks just amazing.

Book cheap flights Kaliningrad-Yekaterinburg and enjoy the most economical flights. Travel with Ural Airlines in comfort!
